title: S2 Ep23: Resolving disputes in Liberia
itunes:title: Resolving disputes in Liberia
description: When there is conflict, can outsiders help by creating informal ways for communities to resolve their disputes? Chris Blattman tells Tim Phillips about the long-term impact of a project to do exactly this in Liberia.
itunes:author: VoxDev.org
